SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend

Class MainEditorController

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.MainEditorController
public class MainEditorController extends Object
The main controller class for the FlowPad text editor application. Handles all UI interactions, document management, and text formatting operations.
